availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Reed, Sr. (Covington, Kentucky, cabinet maker)

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, cabinet maker. Native of England. Married to Ann Reed. Father of John Reed, Mary Reed, and Thomas Reed, Jr. Carpenter in Covington in 1850. Cabinetmaker in Covington in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 1, p. 220; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 1, p. 16; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 4, p. 28; Find A Grave, "Thomas Reed, Sr. (1809-1890)," Memorial #139477005, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=139477005 (accessed June 2, 2017).
